name: Alzheimer GGJ 2020
description:
This year theme was REPAIR. We had 2 days to develop an idea into a playable prototype.

SP *

Alzheimer es un juego donde te encargarás de reconstruir los recuerdos de una persona con dicha enfermedad mental. Nuestro protagonista es una maravillosa célula que se encargará de tocar neuronas con memoria perdida y restablecer el recuerdo que este lleva dentro de sí. ¡Date una vuelta y ve reconstruyendo la vida de esta increible persona!

EN*

Alzheimer is a game where you will be in charge of reconstructing the memories of a person with said mental illness. Our protagonist is a wonderful cell that will be in charge of touching neurons with lost memory and reestablishing the memory that it carries within itself. Take a tour and go rebuilding the life of this incredible person!

You can see our submission here:

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/alzheimer-6
